comments.en:
Multi-function device: Printer, Scanner, Copier.

There is nothing known yet about this printer, someone should test it and report on the Epson forum of this site.

The printing engine seems to be the C62, so try to use it with GIMP-Print pretending that you have the C62.

If it does not print, try to print through the daemon of "mtink". This way the printer is driven in the so-called "packet mode" which is perhaps needed for a multi-function device like this.

For the scanner we have no idea yet from which stand-alone scanner it is derived. Look for an Epson scanner with the same maximum resolution (1200x600 dpi) in the SANE list of supported scanners and try this driver first.

Copying should just work with the front panel of the device.
